name: Kuunganisha
damage_resistances: fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silver

actions.desc: The kuunganisha makes one claw attack and one bite attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.desc: The kuunganisha magically turns invisible until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the fiend wears or carries becomes invisible with it.
actions.name: Invisibility

special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the fiend’s darkvision.
special_abilities.name: Fiend Sight

special_abilities.desc: The kuunganisha has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance

special_abilities.desc: The fiend regains 1 hp at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp.
special_abilities.name: Regeneration

special_abilities.desc: The master of the kuunganisha can cast a spell through the familiar, using the fiend’s senses to target the spell. The range limitations are treated as if the spell originated from the kuunganisha, not the master. The spell effect occurs on the kuunganisha’s turn, though the master must cast the spell during the master’s turn. Concentration spells must still be maintained by the master.
special_abilities.name: Will of the Master
